comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for managing all contacts. It is likely used in an OAuth authorization or settings interface, where users can view and manage their contact information.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'عرض وإدارة جميع الحسابات' translates to 'View and manage all accounts'. The original English content refers to 'contacts', while the Arabic translation refers to 'accounts'. This is a significant difference in meaning.

The translation "Bütün hesablara baxın və idarə edin" translates to "View and manage all accounts," but the original English content says "View and manage all contacts." The words 'accounts' and 'contacts' have different meanings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün əlaqələrə baxın və idarə edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Прегледайте и управлявайте всички профили" translates to "View and manage all profiles". The original English content is "View and manage all contacts". 'Contacts' and 'profiles' are different concepts. The translation doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'contacts'.

The translation 'Zobrazení a správa všech účtů' translates to 'View and manage all accounts,' which is not the same as 'View and manage all contacts'. The original English refers to 'contacts', while the Czech translation refers to 'accounts'.

The translation "Προβολή και διαχείριση όλων των λογαριασμών" translates to 'View and manage all accounts,' which is not the intended meaning of 'View and manage all contacts'. 'Contacts' refers to people, while 'accounts' refers to system accounts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Προβολή και διαχείριση όλων των επαφών

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'contacts' has been translated as 'tilejä' (accounts). 'Contacts' refers to individual people, while 'tilejä' refers to accounts (like social media or email accounts). A more accurate translation would be something like 'yhteystietoja' (contact information) or 'henkilötietoja' (personal information).
The translation "すべての連絡先を見て管理する" is a literal translation and not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'View and manage all contacts' in Japanese. It sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as "すべての連絡先を表示し、管理できます" or "すべての連絡先を閲覧および管理できます".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "모든 계정 보기 및 관리" (Modeun gyejeong bowi mit gwanli) translates to 'View and manage all accounts', which doesn't directly correspond to 'View and manage all contacts'. While 'accounts' and 'contacts' can sometimes be used interchangeably, in this context, 'contacts' is likely the more accurate term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 연락처 보기 및 관리 (Modeun yeonrakcheo bowi mit gwanli)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ເບິ່ງແລະຈັດການຕິດຕໍ່ທັງໝົດ' while literally meaning 'View and manage all contacts', doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'View and manage all contacts' in the context of OAuth accounts. It lacks the implication of *access* or *control* related to OAuth account permissions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເບິ່ງແລະຈັດການບັນຊີຕິດຕໍ່ທັງໝົດ (bew and jadarn banchee contact thangmot)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "contacts" is translated as "kontus", which means "accounts".  'Kontakti' would be the more accurate translation for "contacts".

The English phrase 'View and manage all contacts' is translated as 'Wyświetl wszystkie kontakty i zarządzaj nimi'. While technically correct, 'manage' implies more than just 'zarządzaj', which leans towards 'control' or 'administration'. A more precise translation would emphasize the 'manage' aspect.

The translation 'Afișează și gestionează toate persoane de contact' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'View and manage all contacts.' While understandable, 'persoane de contact' is a bit formal and verbose. 'Contacte' is the more common and concise term.

The English phrase 'View and manage all contacts' implies a more comprehensive action than simply 'View and manage'. The Russian translation is more literal and doesn't fully capture the intended scope.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Просмотр и администрирование всех контактов' or 'Просмотр и редактирование всех контактов' to better reflect the management aspect. Alternatively, 'Просмотреть и управлять всеми контактами' is acceptable, although less impactful.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'View and manage all contacts' is not perfectly conveyed by the Sinhala translation 'සියලු සම්බන්ධතා බලන්න සහ කළමණාකරණය කරන්න'. While ' බලන්න' (balanna - view) and ' කළමණාකරණය කරන්න' (kalamanakaraṇaya karanna - manage) are accurate, 'සියලු සම්බන්ධතා' (siyallu samprādhatā) translates literally to 'all contacts'. A more natural translation might emphasize the ability to see and control contacts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that conveys 'see and control contacts' more naturally, perhaps 'සම්බන්ධතා දැකීමට සහ පාලනය කිරීමට' (samprādhatā dēkimito saha pālanaya kirimito).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'View and manage all contacts' is not perfectly conveyed by the Ukrainian translation 'Переглянути всі контакти та керувати ними'. 'Manage' implies a broader scope than simply 'manage'. A more accurate translation would consider terms like 'редагувати' (edit) or 'адмініструвати' (administer).

The translation 'Xem và quản lý tất cả liên lạc' is a literal translation of 'View and manage all contacts'. While technically correct, 'liên lạc' often refers to communication or contacts in a broader sense. A more natural and accurate translation for 'contacts' in this context (likely referring to contact records in a CRM or similar system) would be 'liên hệ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xem và quản lý tất cả liên hệ
